author: mimoh
name: Android 4.0 Theme (has cinnamon 1.4 support)
description:
Changelog:

0.8.2

Did the changes work out for everyone? 

- Changed Looking Glass dialog to fit theme

- Modified Alt-tab to better fit theme

- Modified Overview switcher icon 

- Altered applet spacing

- Modified transition speed and opacity of notifications

0.8.1

Wow, updates happen pretty quickly for Cinnamon! 

- Revised theme to adhere to Cinnamon 1.4 commits

0.8

- Revised keyboard appearance and effects

- Revised Add-dialog to match theme

- Reduced windows-list border radius to 0px from 4px, also reduced spacing between each item

- Changed pop-up menu item hover to match ICS colors

- Increased the size of the sound icons, eliminated their borders, changed hover color to ICS color

- Slightly increased hover / border alpha in start menu

- Reduced favorites category padding

- Reduced start menu arrow height

- Increased the space between applets

- Reduced divider height ( found within favorites menu, sound menu, wifi menu etc. )

- Removed version history from file name

- Cleaned up a small bit of code

- Plus some other things I can't remember! XD 

0.7

- Changed hover effects to fit theme

- Changed keyboard to fit theme

- Double-checked css elements and corrected to increase theme consistency

- Packaged the ICS wallpaper within theme zip file

*As of now this will be the last major revision based off of my ideas. Any ideas you guys have would be more than welcome ;)

0.6:

- Changed Workspace switcher to fit theme

- Changed Window Tabs to fit theme

- Changed Notifications to fit theme

- Changed ALT + Tab to fit theme

- Changed Search Bar to fit theme

- Chnaged Scroll Bar to fit theme

- Changed Toggle Icon to png ( will change once I learn inkscape a little more )

0.5:

- Slight panel transparency

- Customized Icons ( make sure to change icon path )

- ICS Blue borders

- ICS Blue Scrollbar

- Enhanced overview effect

Check out tiheum's ICS theme. I think he/she did a way better job at it then I did! 

http://cinnamon-spices.linuxmint.com/themes/view/44
